text: Return receipts for the delivery of certified mail which is utilized under any provision of law shall be received in the courts as prima facie evidence of delivery to the same extent as return receipts for registered mail.
historical:

heading.catch_text: Certified mail return receipts as prima facie evidence of delivery.
